alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 9:56PM CDT until June 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jones County in west central Texas... Eastern Fisher County in west central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 956 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rotan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sylvester around 1000 PM CDT. Mccaulley around 1010 PM CDT. Hamlin and Neinda around 1025 PM CDT. Anson around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126, Hitson and Truby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
